titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives in support of Czech-American Heritage Month and recognizing the contributions of Czech Americans to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

bill.summary: 9/6/2000--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideas of Czech-American Heritage Month and recognizes the significant contributions that Czech-Americans have made to the United States.
